description: Try our easy to follow Pancakes with Salmon, Cucumber & Dill Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pancake,Pescatarian,High protein,Soy free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Sesame free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Pancakes with Salmon, Cucumber & Dill Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 smoked salmon, cut into thick strips

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk flour, egg, milk, corn and spring onion together in a bowl until batter is smooth and combined.

Lightly spray a non-stick frying pan with olive oil and heat over medium-low heat. Pour in 1/2 cup of batter. Cook for 1 minute each side or until golden. Transfer to a plate. Repeat, in batches, with the remaining batter, greasing the pan between batches.
Combine cucumber, dill, yoghurt, lemon rind and juice.
Arrange two pancakes on each serving plate and top with yoghurt mixture, salmon slices and rocket. Serve.
